text: "Tonight" is a 1990 song by New Kids on the Block. It was released as the third single from their 1990 album Step by Step. It went to number 2 in the Netherlands, number 3 in the United Kingdom and France, number 4 in Belgium, number 7 in the United States, number 8 in Canada and Ireland and number 16 in Australia and New Zealand. ==Track listings== US and Canada 7-inch single #"Tonight" - 3:27 #"Hold On" - 3:36 ; 7" single / 7" single - Picture disc # "Tonight" — 3:26 # "Hold on" — 3:36 ; 12" maxi / CD maxi # "Tonight" — 3:27 # "Hold on" — 3:36 # "Don't Give Up on Me" — 4:45 == References == Category:1990 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Progressive pop songs Category:New Kids on the Block songs
title: Tonight (New Kids on the Block song)
